column3: cc @hebasto @jarolrod @fanquake\n\nWould love feedback from other M1 users as well.
So these are run via emulation?
> So these are run via emulation?\n\nI haven't tried running it via emulation, I ran it locally on my machine.
You're downloading x86-64 binaries, not AArch64 binaries. That only makes sense if they actually work.

> You're downloading x86-64 binaries, not AArch64 binaries. That only makes sense if they actually work.\n\nYes, I am aware running the script fetches the old x86-64 osx binaries. The good thing is these old binaries work on the machine (thanks to rosetta 2 translation). Hence, adding the 'aarch64' platform to fetch these old binaries is an easy solution for Apple Silicon machines to run those bin

Works as expected.
